name: ResultPress
author: Rasel Ahmed

sections.description:
ResultPress is a VERY cool plugin for showing exam result in your WordPress website. This plugin using AJAX & you can import CSV result for faster indexing result in database. Full features below:

Feaures

  • Unlimited results
  • Dropdown category
  • AJAX data processing
  • Included Security
  • Easy option panel
  • Easy result add panel
  • Video tutorials

Result demo

See documentation here.

Video tutorials

  • How to install & use resultpress plugin: https://youtu.be/2BVfbjkULQo
  • How to use captcha on resultpress plugin: https://youtu.be/-h6oLql-Dws
  • How to import excel or csv data on resultpress plugin: https://youtu.be/sGY4FlvSk1c

Library used

  • CMB2
  • Google reCaptcha
  • jQuery Labelauty
  • jQuery Range
  • jQuery Nice Select

Special thanks

  • Alberuni Azad – for selecting nice name.
  • Mahmood Bin Masihullah – For giving me this IDEA.
  • Md. Abul Bashar – For nice suggestion.
  • Ohidul Islam – For help me on some code.
sections.installation:
Using this plugin is VERY easy. Lets do in three steps:

  1. Just install via Plugin > Add new & search from WP directory. Or use upload method.
  2. After adding result, you are ready to insert shortcode on page. Shortcode is: `[resultpress]`
  3. If you want to add year & exam type dropdown, you need to use shortcode like this `[resultpress classes=”SSC,HSC,Others” years=”2014,2015,2016″]` – values must match what you added on result.

That’s all for today! Easy enough!

Contact with us if you are in any trouble. We are happy to help you.
